description:
She is Daisuke`s classmate and friend. Daisuke has fallen in love with her, but she does not return his affections. She cares about him, but only as a friend. She has tailored herself for a tall, prominent, important "dream guy". Phantom Dark seems to be all that she has dreamed of in a man.
She and Riku are twins, Risa being the younger of the two. Her appearance is sweet, feminine and she has an air of romanticism. She is the more "girlie" of the two sisters. She relies on tarot cards for predictions of what her and her sister`s future brings.
name: Harada Risa
